content: "Democracy is two wolves and a lamb deciding what to have for dinner. Liberty is a well-armed lamb." - Benjamin Franklin What Ben means is you Democrats leave the 2nd Amendment " ALONE " Ain't SEABEE'S "CAN DO", "HAVE DONE", AND WILL DO SO FOREVER. GOD BLESS AMERICA

title: 2nd Amendment

content: The Constitution is not an instrument for the government to restrain the people, it is an instrument for the people to restrain the government – lest it come to dominate our lives and interests. – Patrick Henry
reply: The Constitution is not an instrument for the government to restrain the people, it is an instrument for the people to restrain the government – lest it come to dominate our lives and interests. – Patrick Henry
title: 2nd Amendment

content: The Constitution preserves "the advantage of being armed which Americans possess over the people of almost every other nation...(where) the governments are afraid to trust the people with arms."...The Federalist, No. 46 Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!
